ModMetaData.name: RimDark 40k - Mankinds Finest
ModMetaData.author: Phonicmas
ModMetaData.description: Rimdark 40k - Mankinds Finest module. Build an Imperial gene-lab to transform your pawns into Space Marines, Thunder Warriors, Custodes, or even Primarchs through research and gene-seed implantation. The mod features new xenotypes, unique genes (Perpetual, Psyker, Pariah), a rank-based Astartes progression system, and a basic power armor set with legion color/heraldry customization and decoration system.
